channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump will visit disaster zones in North Carolina and California on the first trip of second term
item.description: President Donald Trump is heading to hurricane-battered western North Carolina and wildfire-ravaged Los Angeles. It’s the first trip of his second term.

item.title: Trump targets California water policy as he prepares to tour LA fire damage
What to know about the ruling blocking Trump’s order on birthright citizenship
